spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of enomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 305,552 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.
Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,531 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a high chance to summon a phantom ethereal, dealing 201,465 Shadow damage to your target and 18,131 Shadow damage to all other enemies caught in its path. 

If the target is below 35% health, this effect summons two additional phantoms at 25% effectiveness.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a high chance to apply Queensbane to your target, dealing 144,005 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
